scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify ] -t hbsfy -t require-globify js/main.js | uglifyjs -c > js/bundle.min.js
scripts.build-test: browserify -t [ babelify ] -t hbsfy -t require-globify tests/tests.js > tests/tests.bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify ] -t hbsfy -t require-globify js/main.js -o js/bundle.min.js
scripts.watch-test: watchify -t [ babelify ] -t hbsfy -t require-globify tests/tests.js -o tests/tests.bundle.js
